scripts.test: npm run owntests && npm run test262
scripts.pretest262: find test262/test262 -maxdepth 0 || git clone https://github.com/tc39/test262.git test262/test262 --depth 1
scripts.test262: cat test262/prelude.prefix lib/index.js test262/prelude.suffix > test262/prelude.js && test262-harness --prelude test262/prelude.js "test262/test262/test/built-ins/Date/**/*.js"
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.build: mkdir lib 2>nul & sjs -r -m ./src/macros.js src/index.js > ./lib/index.js && babel lib/index.js --out-file lib/index.js
